headline: Can Analyst Optimism on Invesco (IVZ) Shift Its Long-Term Fundamentals or Just Sentiment?
summary: Several analysts have recently raised their outlook and price targets for Invesco, reflecting a more optimistic sentiment despite the firm's ongoing fundamental challenges. This shift in analyst perspectives has attracted increased investor attention, underscoring how sentiment changes can influence capital flows for asset managers even when operating performance remains mixed. We’ll examine how improved analyst sentiment and higher expectations impact Invesco’s long-term investment...

headline: 'This Feels Different To Me,' Says Award-Winning Fund Manager
summary: Just as teams build success around star franchise players, Invesco's Ron Zibelli constructs his top mutual fund around marquee stocks.

headline: Their Funds May Not Beat the Market. Their Stocks Just Might.
summary: While the  has more than doubled over the past five years, T. Rowe’s stock has barely budged.  T. Rowe isn’t the only fund company struggling to keep up in recent years.  Going back a decade, the only major fund company to beat the S&P 500 is  BlackRock  edging out the market by a percentage point on an annualized basis.
